reviews.customers_say: Customers find this dress gorgeous and well-made, with one noting its hourglass silhouette.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfy stretchy and dressy!
items.body: I wore this for my baby shower and got so many compliments! Itâ€™s the perfect shade of baby pink! So comfortable and flattering, love ruching dresses for any occasion really, helps hide my tummy imperfections and in this case it accentuated my belly which is exactly what I wanted! I felt like it was the perfect midi length dress and Iâ€™m 5â€™3â€ felt great all day, it is that sheer material but was not see through and felt well made! I would definitely wear this dress again! Read more
items.author: Katelyn Gohlke

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Yes! Love this dress
items.body: Beautiful dress! Wine Red was perfect for Holiday Party . Plenty of stretch. Great quality. Hugs the curves and comfortable. TTS but I wore shapewear underneath just to smooth everything out. Itâ€™s pretty and looks way more expensive. Received so many compliments I also bought the black! Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love it
items.body: Love this dress. I looked good if i do say so myself. One thing though when you wash it wash it by itself. It will bleed def dyed a bra pink on accident. Not see through, good material, soft , comfortable, flattering. Fits as expected. Read more
items.author: Miranda

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Pure perfection !
items.body: This dress was perfect for my bridal shower. Itâ€™s comfortable, sexy and fits in all the right spots. I absolutely love it. So many compliments ðŸ«¶ Read more
items.author: kimberly Bunnell

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars I love it. Donâ€™t size Up.
items.body: Great dress. Decent material for the cost. Stick to your size. Some say to size up but donâ€™t. I had to return the L and reorder M which is my size. The fit was perfect, like a glove. Itâ€™s not see through at lease bot on me. The frabric is stretchy. Read more
items.author: Joselin

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing dress!
items.body: Gorgeous dress! Perfect wedding guest dress. Olive was actually a beautiful apple green. Plenty of stretch so if youâ€™re between sizes, size down. Hugs the curves and was super comfortable. Definitely need shapewear underneath to support but itâ€™s so pretty and looks way more expensive than it was. Got so many compliments! Read more
items.author: Danielle

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Complimentary to a curvy figure!
items.body: Recommend a body shaper or compression garment underneath and a strapless bra, but the ruched fabric is very contouring and sexy. The dress was very comfortable and stretchy, I love it. I'm a size 18 or 2x bottoms, 1x top, 36 D bra and 5'6 tall at 245 lbs for reference! Read more
items.author: sarah

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Check for Stains!! Other than that- Comfy and cute
items.body: **Iâ€™m giving this 3 stars cause the most recent time I ordered this dress, they sent me a used, extra wrinkled, and stained dress with food all over the front lol. But Iâ€™m not super upset about it, cause Iâ€™m returning and ordering a different size anyway because I didn't like how the XXL fit up top. I just hope the next one isnâ€™t stained cause I donâ€™t have that much time until my event where I wanted to wear this dress!!** -My honest review would be 5 stars, because this dress is beautiful! Definitely doesnâ€™t fit larger boobs in the same way it would with the material hanging down in frontâ€¦ So thatâ€™s kind of a bummer. But itâ€™s still stretchy, comfy, and cute. Formal and comfy as heck. I did put some bathing suit inserts in the top so my nipples wouldnâ€™t show through. They stayed in place just fine with the XL when I tried it on. I ordered the rust color to see how Iâ€™d like it (pictured) in a size XL, in this picture Iâ€™m 5â€™9â€, about 220lbs and 30 weeks pregnant. Fit nicely everywhere! (Besides the material thatâ€™s supposed to hang on the boobs) but I think this look is just fine. I wanted to actually get one in a teal color (Lake Blue) for my baby shower next month (I will be 36 weeks at the time) so I ordered an XXL just to see the difference in size since Iâ€™ll be bigger, but I think I might still stick with the XL though cause there is extra wiggle room up top with this one and theyâ€™re so stretchy I think I can get away with my bump being bigger in it! Hope this helps y'all, itâ€™s a cute ass dress. Just check for stains! Read more
items.author: Erin

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Cocktail Sleeveless Split Maxi Bodycon Ruched is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Cocktail Sleeveless Split Maxi Bodycon Ruched is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Brown, Blue, Dark Pink, Olive Green, Army Green, Black, Coffee, Orange, Dark Brown, Dark Green, Light Blue, Red, Rose Red, Bright Blue. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
